oai_dc:dc.dc:title: In Defense of Busing
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: civil rights; Catholic Diocese; busing; religion;
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Sermon deliverd at the Birmingham Unitarian Church in support of busing as an equal rights issue.
